column5: I picked up my new Lowrance H2Oc today from Fishing World. I'll have to go back in a few weeks or so and get the ram mount and the Navionics chip. Navionics will have Lake Nippissing on this years cards and the price is coming down too! Now I just gotta figure out how to dump a few cards into one so I don't need to carry (and therefore lose) a few different cards.
Let me know when you get the dump figured out, because Ol' Yeller just ordered me one those same units today. I can hardly wait for it to mget here!
Rick, is Nip gonna be a seperate card by itself, or will it be included on the Eastern Great Lakes chip and did you get a price on it ??
I think Nip will be in the Canada chip and not the Great Lakes chip, but not sure, Lew.
That's interesting news Rick.  Keep us posted. Looking at upgrading this year and purchasing a Navionics chip.

That will be on the other chip Lew that will have all of the smaller and not so charted Lakes on it like Lake Muskoka and a bunch in the Kingston area.  Navionics Hotmaps Premium - code: CANADA	BC, NS, ON , QC 	PREM-C2  JP
I can't see them putting Nipissing anywhere but on the 901 chip.
